description:
Listed Building Consent application in connection with internal alterations to alter layout of rooms behind reception area at ground floor including: 1) removing three timber stud partitions, 2) constructing four metal stud partitions, 3) installing tile and grid suspended ceiling in central lobby/circulation area only, 4) replacing vinyl sheet flooring, 5) replacing timber doors and linings (removing existing fanlights above doors).
This application may affect the setting of a listed building.  Town and Country Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended); Section 67.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:	The works hereby permitted shall be begun not later than three years from the date of this consent.

REASON:   To comply with the provisions of Section 18(1)(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
